data.description:
Run is a VR app that combines fitness and fun. It uses Bounce-In-Place motion to let you run or walk on the spot in various virtual environments. Whether you are indoors due to bad weather, lockdown, sleeping kids or any other reason, you can enjoy a smooth and exhilarating VR run. Plus, you will encounter some unexpected and amusing surprises along the way

Collect all the coins, or find the hidden diamonds to unlock achievements in each level.

Our app has one goal: to get you moving and have fun at the same time. 

Try it today! It’s free!

changelog.change_log:
In this exhilarating update to our VR running game, we’ve introduced an exciting new way to propel yourself forward: arm swinging! Now, as you sprint through the virtual landscapes, you can literally swing your arms to gain momentum and surge ahead. It’s an immersive experience that’ll make you feel like you’re sprinting through the digital world.

But don’t take our word for it—try it out for yourself in any of the levels! Whether you’re racing through the forest or exploring the desert, the arm-swinging mechanic adds a whole new dimension to your gameplay.

And that’s not all! We’ve also addressed a common concern: offline play. With this update, you can confidently run your purchased levels even when you’re not connected to the internet. So whether you’re on a remote cabin or simply prefer to game offline, our VR running adventure has got you covered.

Get ready to break a sweat, feel the wind in your virtual hair, and conquer those levels like never before. Lace up your digital sneakers, swing those arms, and let the adrenaline flow!

Smoother Movement: Experience a significantly improved movement system that enhances your in-game agility.
Crisper Main Menu: The main menu now boasts increased resolution, providing a visually polished and inviting interface.
Sky World Level Enhancements: Dive into an even more captivating Sky World with refined details and immersive visuals.
Enhanced Button Functionality: We’ve added new functionalities to the game controller buttons, making your gameplay more intuitive and exciting.
Info-Tab Updates: Don’t forget to explore the updated info-tab to discover the purpose of each button.
This update not only enhances the appearance of the grass but also significantly reduces the installation size.
We’re excited to introduce the latest update to our game, including a preview of the level Sky World! This update also includes enhanced graphics and a redesigned context menu.
Extra menu button for easy access. Improved Valentine's Day level, with more "cheesy" feedbacks and nice clouds.

Valentine's Day level. 
Mini Map in the Maze. 
More audio feedback.
Now with support for Scoreboards! And some minor bug fixes.
Includes a preview of a 1D level for Elliptical Machines. And a tab with some statistics.
Improvements for the Holiday Special level. Northern Lights and much more to collect!
Now with a free Holiday Special level. This update also includes improved graphics in the tutorial and a path in the Snow Day level.
Now with grass and flowers on North Island and some minor bug fixes.
Now supports hand tracking and also have upgraded graphics.
